Internships and Placements

Graduates of the M.Tech in Data Science program at IIT Guwahati are sought after by leading companies and research organizations. The program equips students with advanced technical and analytical skills, interdisciplinary thinking, and hands-on project experience â€” making them well-prepared for roles in data science, AI, machine learning, research, and analytics across diverse industries.

We invite recruiters and organizations to harness the potential of our talented students and witness their transformative impact on the industry. To gather more information about the placement procedure at IIT Guwahati, please reach out to us through the following.

  • Centre for Career Development, IIT Guwahati
